snippet.title: What can we learn from Nebraska, the last team to own the SEC?
snippet.description:
What can we learn from Nebraska, the last team to own the SEC? by Michael Bird on Jun 17 2013, 9:55a
9-0 over a two-decade period. 15-1-1 over a three-decade period. How did Nebraska dominate the SEC, and what can we learn from this example?

snippet.title: Darren Bent, Aston Villa, And A Case Of Disproportionate Incredulity
snippet.description:
Darren Bent, Aston Villa, And A Case Of Disproportionate Incredulity by Richard Farley on Jan 19 2011, 3:12a
Many see Aston Villa as having overpaid for their new striker, handing over a club record fee to bring Darren Bent to Villa Park. Beyond agreeing with those voices, SB Nation Soccer Editor Richard...
